GSD.description:
MIPS: fix fortify panic when copying asm exception handlers

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.238 by commit 5176c671afb67130298cf5653949309decf4ae66. For more details please see the references link.
